headline: Tech Bro Uniform Meets Margaret Thatcher
abstract: A new exhibition in San Francisco makes art out of the Patagonia vest, the former prime minister of England and â€¦ Salesforce?
lead_paragraph: The death knell of the Patagonia vest, at least as a symbol of utopianism co-opted by the tech and venture capital world and transformed into shorthand for a certain kind of unbridled corporate power, was much predicted last summer.
